name: Families System
description: Families Bot is the only Discord bot you'll ever need. It has powerfull latest features which can manage discord server. It contains latest discord features like buttons, forms, menu, etc
feature1: Security and Reliability, Families Bot prioritizes server security and reliability, providing peace of mind for server owners and administrators.
feature2: Moderation, It has many moderation command with latest discord fetures like timeout.
feature3: auto moderation, Automatically detects and handles spam, offensive language, excessive emojis, links, and other unwanted content
feature4: Ticket, It is very easy to pull the ticket and close it. It has buttons to make more easy to use.
